cab.content: secret this Document is the Pioperty of J K7E\V&\-.ivic Maj88tYys government from F?ceroi/, 24^ Jwfy 1920. (Received 11 a.m.)920' S. Mussoorie Conference. Following telegram has been received from Dobbs, 110 S. of 22nd July We discussed to-day miscellaneous subjects such as the property of the Afghan post office at Peshawar seized during war, outstanding debt of Afghanistan to British firms, arrangements for exchange of posts. Afghans are anxious to receive complete authorised translation of all our proceedings before leaving. Their departure has therefore been deferred to 26th July."We propose issuing in due course communique summing up the results of the-. -Conference,.'text of which we will telegraph to you for simultaneous publication.
